version_description:
New customization of page size query result.
New customization of SQL syntax colors.
Fixed execution of query with comments.

New ER Diagram (interactive and with PNG export)
New view and execution for Functions and Store Procedures
Improved JSON highlighting and formatting
Improved insert and edit record
New records navigator on single record view 
Filter entities of current schema only
Fixed reconnection issues
Fixed grid column resize

New section "My Queries" synchronizable via iCloud.
New "Queries History" section to keep track of all queries execution.

New multi result for multi select statement.
New MSAccess(XML) export.
New export compression format (Zip or GZip).

Improved column type choice for create or alter table.
SSH tunnel stability improvements and support for ECDSA and Ed25519 auth keys.
Improved grid search and bug fix.

• New barcode scanner for data entry
• New delete multiple rows feature
• New GeoJSON rendering support
• Haptic feedback support

• Add visibility of system schema/database.
• Fixed support of Pinyin keyboard.
• More bug fix.

• Fields visible directly on the table's name list and E-R diagram
• E-R diagram export to PDF
• Fix timeout issue on MySQL version 5.x
• Fix editor script for functions and procedures

• New SQL completion assistant.
• Organize queries by hashtag (with a #tag in query's comment).
• New named parameters in SQL query and autosave of params value.
• More bug fix.

・New redesigned section for authentication keys
・New support for key authentication with Secure Enclave

・New option to sort for table list by name (default) or number of records
・Fix of column grid width resize
